cmds.logger:filter: deno run -A --unstable tests/logger/smart-logger.ts filter -f csv -k Code /tmp/games
cmds.logger:json: deno run -A --unstable tests/logger/smart-logger.ts json -f csv -k Code.exe /tmp/games
cmds.logger:pids: deno run -A --unstable tests/logger/smart-logger.ts pids -f csv -k Code.exe /tmp/games
cmds.logger:send: deno run -A --unstable tests/logger/smart-logger.ts send -f csv -k Code.exe /tmp/games
cmds.logger:kill: deno run -A --unstable tests/logger/smart-logger.ts kill -f csv -k Code.exe /tmp/games
